message_template.content:
Using a variety of sentence structures, generate a realistic electronic health question answering record. Output must strictly follow the XML format shown below. Do not include explanations or text outside of the XML tags.
 The required XML format is:

<case>
    <introduction>
 This XML includes a patient narrative, key phrases identifying focal points of the question, one related rephrased clinician question, and supporting evidence.
    </introduction>
    <patient_narrative>
        ...
    </patient_narrative>
    <patient_question>
        <phrase id="0" start_char_index="..."> ... </phrase>
        <phrase id="1" start_char_index="..."> ... </phrase>
        ...
    </patient_question>
    <clinician_question>
        ...
    </clinician_question>
    <note_excerpt>
        ...
    </note_excerpt>
</case>

Now generate one new <case> entry which has: at least one <phrase> element in <patient_question> with correct character offset extract from <patient_narrative>; a <clinician_question> paraphrased from <patient_question>; and a detailed <note_excerpt> with plausible clinical note text.
